name: Mush Christmas Edition - Visual Theme
description: Seasonal Mush Theme. Add some Christmas colours and spirit into the game!
additional_info:
If you are familiar with Somber Cosmos, you will notice a lot of improvement and bigger changes have taken place. This time its a complete overhaul. Works for both English and French servers, supports Astropad and CTRL+W.


Version: 1.1

- Fixed CTRL+W element interference
- Added CTRL+W color correction


Version: 1.0 

- Removed tips from the Tips Section in chat window (Now Only General Announcements appear there.)
- Removed "Activate Gold" banner from character picture (Bronze members.)
- Removed Flashing character level indicator
- Removed Logo
- Removed Bottom banners (As a result, main window scroll is non existant on Full HD screens.)
- Removed Help Icon

- Added new background
- Added new main window design elements
- Added new alert animation
- Added new button appearance
- Added new chat box appearance
- Added new deathscreen appearance
- Added new end page appearance
- Added new icons
- Added Astropad color correction
